definition: corner/edge/arris (sharp ridge formed by two surfaces meeting at an edge)/protrusion

sentences.english: The optimum design of low loss beam expanding prism system is suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了扩束棱镜透过性能的最优设计方法。

sentences.english: Further, the paper expounds the judicious method used to determine errors of right-angle prism.
sentences.chinese: 进而阐明了直角棱镜误差给定的合理方法。

sentences.english: The curved glass lenses at each end of the telescope acted like prisms.
sentences.chinese: 望远镜两端的曲面玻璃镜头起到了三棱镜的作用。

sentences.english: The errors caused by prism extinction ratio variation are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了棱镜消光比变化引起的误差。

sentences.english: Wooden walkways allow visitors to closely approach the Grand Prismatic Spring.
sentences.chinese: 木制人行道容许游客更近地接近大棱镜温泉。

sentences.english: The mass production of prism binoculars by Zeiss then began in 1894.
sentences.chinese: 1894年蔡司公司开始大量生产棱镜双目望远镜。

sentences.english: Explain why different colours refract by differing amounts in the prism.
sentences.chinese: 解释为什么不同颜色以不同数量在棱镜内折射。

sentences.english: Develop the brand — new 35 channels multiwavelength pyrometer with prisms for beam split instead of interference filters.
sentences.chinese: 研制了棱镜分光无干涉滤光片式35波长高温计。

sentences.english: The detection concept for large diameter beam parallelism with penta prism is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了用五棱镜法检测大口径光束平行度的原理。

sentences.english: The light passing through a prism is dispersed into a band of colours.
sentences.chinese: 通过棱镜的光线色散成一条彩色的光带。

sentences.english: A novel optic bridge compensation technique using polarization splitting prism is presented in paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种使用偏振分光棱镜的新型光桥式补偿技术。

sentences.english: The methods for selecting penta prism and reducing the effect of surface profile error on detection are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了选择五棱镜的方法和减小面形误差影响的方法。

sentences.english: Biv can with a lens be resolved to tidy white sunbeam once again.
sentences.chinese: 可以用一块棱镜将透射的白光发散出来。

sentences.english: The distribution curves of light intensity of orthogonal biprism interference is made from experimental results.
sentences.chinese: 通过实验结果作出正交双棱镜干涉的光强度分布曲线。

sentences.english: These gratings act as prisms by diffracting light within the fiber.
sentences.chinese: 通过光纤中的衍射光，这些光栅可以被看作三棱镜。

sentences.english: The prelude was as iridescent as a prism in a morning room.
sentences.chinese: 这个序曲就象清晨房间里的一块三棱镜一样灿烂辉煌。

definition: Faraday (name)/Michael Faraday (1791-1867), British experimental physicist prominent in the development of electricity
executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
see 騰訊控股有限公司|腾讯控股有限公司[Teng2 xun4 Kong4 gu3 You3 xian4 Gong1 si1]
to reveal/to publish/to make public/to announce
